ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR(
AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "Core Sales", $Profile.Name = "Core Virtual Sales Rep", $Profile.Name = "Core Sales - SB"), RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreOpportunityDSARecordType" || RecordType.Name = "Core Referral Revenue Opportunity Record Type - DSA"),
AND( OR ( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS 401(k) Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HNBF Sales Rep'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO Centric Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO-ASO Sales') ,$Profile.Name = 'Hybrid Sales Rep'), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PEOASOOpportunityFSSRecordType', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PEO_Opportunity_FSS_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HNBF_Opportunity_DSA_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HRS401kOpportunityFSSRecordType')),
AND( OR ($Profile.Name ="MMS Sales",$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales Quote",$Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ="MMSOpportunityDSARecordType" , RecordType.DeveloperName ="MMSReferralRevenueOpportunityDSA")),
AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "TAA Sales Rep" ,$Profile.Name = "Hybrid Sales Rep"), RecordType.DeveloperName ="TAA_DSA_Opportunity_Record_Type"),
AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "NSS Outbound Rep", $Profile.Name = "NSS Inbound Rep"), RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreReferralRevenueOpportunityRecordTypeDSA"),
AND( OR( $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Payment_Processing_DSA_Opportunity', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PCWC_Opportunity_DSA_Record_Type') ) ),
NOT( $User.Sales_Division__c = 'Virtual PC'), Probability >= 0.9, ISCHANGED(CloseDate)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the close date once the Opportunity has been submitted to the sales admin.
